title: Tab Lister
name: tab-lister
description: Yet another (very simple) tab lister. A possible update to Binny's "Url Lister".
author: Dejan Budimir

preferences.name: tab_format
preferences.title: Tab format
preferences.description: Each tab will be written to the clipboard like this.

preferences.name: header_format
preferences.title: Header
preferences.description: Will be written above the tab output.

preferences.name: footer_format
preferences.title: Footer
preferences.description: Will be appended to the completed tab output.
